name: flowsphere-mcp-server
description: Generate production-ready test code (Python pytest/behave, JavaScript Jest) from FlowSphere configurations. Supports all 18 FlowSphere features including HTTP execution, variable substitution, conditions, validations, and more.
author: Yannis Moudilos

tools.name: get_flowsphere_schema
tools.description: Get complete FlowSphere configuration schema documentation including all properties, types, examples, and edge cases

tools.name: get_flowsphere_features
tools.description: Get detailed documentation of all 18 FlowSphere features with implementation notes

tools.name: get_feature_checklist
tools.description: Get a checklist of all 18 features that must be implemented in generated code

tools.name: generate_python_pytest
tools.description: Generate production-ready Python pytest code from FlowSphere configuration. Supports all 18 features including HTTP execution, variable substitution, conditions, validations, and more.

tools.name: generate_python_behave
tools.description: Generate Python behave/BDD tests with Gherkin feature files and step definitions. Produces human-readable test scenarios for stakeholders.

tools.name: generate_javascript_jest
tools.description: Generate JavaScript Jest tests with async/await and modern ES6+ syntax. Includes complete APISequence class and package.json.
